caller_intent: The caller wants to bundle their auto policy (with Progressive) with homeowners insurance and understand how this bundling affects their insurance coverage.
resolution_steps: Agent asked for the phone number associated with the policy.
Caller provided the number and confirmed their name (Craig).
Agent stated they would need to transfer the call to an agent and asked the caller to hold.
knowledge_required: Access to internal policy lookup systems
summary: Craig contacted Alliance Insurance to inquire about bundling his Progressive auto policy with homeowners insurance. The agent attempted to access his policy but was unable to retrieve it, prompting a transfer to another agent. The call ended with Craig being placed on hold for the transfer.
